title: Huge, Newly Renovated Duplex
posting_body: Large and newly renovated apartment featuring:
- 2 large bedrooms that each can accommodate a king size bed
- two nice, good sized bathrooms (one on each level)
- two living room areas and a separate den area that can be used as an office
- direct interior access to shared laundry room
- newer (few years old) oven, dishwasher and garbage disposal, microwave, granite counter tops and much more.
- Safe building with secure windows, etc.
- Located a block west of Western and about a block north of Division.
Outside parking in the back of the building is also available at an additional cost for one parking space.
- Renter responsible for gas, electric, internet, etc.
***This is a really special unit in a well maintained 6-unit building***
